title: Highest Education Expenditure as a Percentage of GNI
description: In 2021, Micronesia allocated 23.63% of its Gross National Income to education, showcasing a significant investment in human capital.

title: Lowest Mortality from Road Traffic Injuries
description: With only 0.2 deaths per 100,000 people in 2019, Micronesia has one of the lowest road traffic mortality rates globally.

title: High External Health Expenditure
description: In 2022, 77.25% of Micronesia's health expenditure was funded externally, indicating a reliance on international support for healthcare.

title: Minimal Terrestrial Protected Areas
description: As of 2018, only 0.05% of Micronesia's land area was designated as protected, highlighting a potential area for environmental improvement.

title: Low Mobile Cellular Subscriptions
description: In 2021, Micronesia had just 19.45 mobile subscriptions per 100 people, indicating limited access to mobile technology.

title: Minimal Manufacturing Value Added
description: In 2023, the manufacturing sector contributed only $2.26 million in current US dollars, reflecting a small industrial base.

title: Low Merchandise Exports to MENA
description: Micronesia's merchandise exports to the Middle East & North Africa were virtually nonexistent in 2021, at 0.00001% of total exports.
